message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[11-Apr-2025 13:11:04 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_bank_details ( bank_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, bank_name varchar(255) NULL, interest varchar(255) NULL, PRIMARY KEY bank_id (bank_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
